<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.38

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a weapon item to the specified weapon. The item can be weapon magazine, in which case the amount of ammo and target muzzle could also be specified.
* Since Arma 3 v1.95 it is possible to add item instantly skipping the animation by providing optional boolean

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addWeaponItem''' [weaponName, itemName, instant]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [weaponName, itemName, instant]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]] - name of the weapon to add magazine to
</value></part><part><name>p4 </name>=<value> itemName: [[String]] - class name of the item to add (if magazine, muzzle will be autodetected)
</value></part><part><name>p5 </name>=<value> instant (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to skip animation. Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> unit '''addWeaponItem''' [weaponName, [itemName, ammoCount, muzzleName], instant]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [weaponName, [magazineName, ammoCount, muzzleName], instant]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]] - name of the weapon to add magazine to
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> [itemName, ammoCount, muzzleName]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p25 </name>=<value> itemName: [[String]] - class name of the item to add (if magazine, muzzle will be autodetected unless specified)
</value></part><part><name>p26 </name>=<value> ammoCount (Optional): [[Number]] - optional amount of ammo in magazine
</value></part><part><name>p27 </name>=<value> muzzleName (Optional): [[String]] - optional target muzzle to add magazine to
</value></part><part><name>p28 </name>=<value> instant (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to skip animation. Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addWeaponItem]] ["arifle_MX_GL_ACO_F", "1Rnd_HE_Grenade_shell"];</code>
